meanings.definition: Inflammation of the synovial membrane, typically causing pain and swelling in the joints.
meanings.sent1: The synovitis in her knee made it difficult to walk.
meanings.sent2: Doctors diagnosed him with synovitis after his knee swelled up.
meanings.sent3: The synovitis in the joint decided to throw a party, causing pain to the host.
meanings.sent4: The synovitis crept through his joints like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The vivid redness of synovitis in the joints was unforgettable.
